'''Fried Shrimp Beanballs''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Fried Shrimp Beanballs can be found inside an [[Chest|Exquisite Chest]] on top of a watch-tower, to the south of the [[Ancient Watchtower]] [[Domain]].

Depending on the quality, Fried Shrimp Beanballs increases all party members' [[Shield]] strength by '''20'''/'''25'''/'''30'''%. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Mualani|Pass the Luck}}
